did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Extension Teaching prize speaking contests records, 1908-1971.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Cooperative Extension. Teaching and Information Department

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Material documenting Prize Speaking Contests held under the auspices of the Oral Expression Division of Extension Teaching, including the Eastman Stage in Public Speaking, the Farm Life Challenge Contest; and the Home Economics Stage in Public Speaking.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Beginning in 1908, two Agricultural Stages in public speaking were given under the auspices of the Agricultural Association, with small prizes awarded by the college. In 1910, trustee Almon R. Eastman established the Eastman Stage, with a permanent endowment beginning in 1918. The Eastman Stage was held continually except in 1943 and 1944. The Farm Life Challenge Contest began in 1928 and was later renamed the Rice Debate Stage in honor of Professor James E. Rice. The Home Economics Stage in Public Speaking began in 1940. Later known as the Elsie Van Buren Rice Public Speaking Stage, it was sponsored by the Home Economics Club.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook of programs and clippings documenting Prize Speaking Contests held under the auspices of the Oral Expression Division of Extension Teaching, including the Eastman Stage in Public Speaking, the Farm Life Challenge Contest; and the Home Economics Stage in Public Speaking. Includes letters to and from Andrew Dickson White. Also newspaper articles and programs pertaining to the Eastman and Rice Speaking competitions, 1908-1970; photographs of contestants in Eastman, Eastman-Rice, Farm Life Challenge Contests; Speeches from the Eastman and Elsie Van Buren Rice Stage competitions; Scrapbook from George Abram Everett containing information about Cornell University theatrical productions and photographs, 1914-1920.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Agriculture -- Students.
New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences. Dept. of Communication Arts.
New York State College of Home Economics -- Students.

did.unittitle: Scrapbook: Oral Expression Division of Extension Teach. Prize Speaking Contests

scopecontent.p: Contains photographs of speaking contest winners. Includes programs and newspaper clippings about the Eastman Stage, the Farm Life Challenge Contest, and the Elsie Van Buren Rice Stage. Clippings come from publications including the Cornell Daily Sun, The Ithaca Journal, and the New York Times.
A few letters to and from Andrew D. White pertaining to Public Speaking Contests
Third Annual Farm Life Challenge Contest, February 10, 1930
Woodford Prize Speaking, January 6, 1971
Silver Anniversary of the Rice Debate Stage
Golden Anniversary of the Eastman Stage in Public Speaking

1968-Percival Prince "Racial Harmony in a Multi-Racial Society of the British Caribbean", Ira Lipsky, Timothy Schiavoni "The Middle Generation", Brooke Breslow

did.unittitle: Scrapbook of Professor George Abram Everett

scopecontent.p: Contains an unlabeled photograph, Newspaper clippings from various publications, including the Post Standard, Watertown Times, and the Cornell Daily Sun. The clippings vary in content, but generally involve either war or the production of Kermis (which includes a program). Also, a few letters to Professor Everett.
